Detailed Description

Combines wxExListViewWithFrame and wxExFile, giving you a list control with file synchronization support.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void wxExListViewFile::DoFileLoad ( bool  synced = false) [protected, virtual]

Invoked by FileLoad, allows you to load the file.

The file is already opened, so you can call Read. If synced is true, this call was a result of CheckSync and not of FileLoad.

Reimplemented from wxExFile.

virtual void wxExListViewFile::DoFileSave ( bool  save_as = false) [protected, virtual]

Invoked by FileSave, allows you to save the file.

The file is already opened.

Reimplemented from wxExFile.

virtual bool wxExListViewFile::ItemFromText ( const wxString &  text) [virtual]

Tries to insert items from specified text.

Returns true if successfull.

Reimplemented from wxExListViewFileName.
